WELCOMING MESSAGE

Its my great pleasure to welcome you to Masaka Parents SSS. Our school is a place of high standards, mutual respect,and a shared commitment to the pe ursuit of excellence in all that we do. At Masaka Parents,we are dedicatd to providing an outstanding education that enables every student to realise their full potential. We value academic achievement highly, but we also recognise the impotanceof developing well_rounded individuals who demonstrate integrity, resilience,and a sense of responibility to others. Our staff are deeply commited to ensuring that every student benefits from a rich and challenging curriculum,supported by a wide range of extracurricular opportunities that encourage creativity,leadership,and personal growth. We take great pride in fostering an enviroment in which all members of our community feel safe,valued,and inpired to succeed. Whether you are a prospective parent,a current member of our school community,or a visitor exploring what we offer, I hope this website gives you a sense of the warmth,ambition,and excellence that defines Masaka Parents SS. Thank you for taking the time to learn more about us. I warmly invite you to visit our school and experience the Masaka Parents SS spirit for yourself.
MUTEGANDA MUSA
HEAD TEACHER
MASAKA PARENTS SS

HISTORY OF THE SCHOOL

Masaka Parents SSS was started in 2001 by four directors that include Hajjat Janat Kayondo Mr.Sseruggo Robert Ssekkoba Mr.Ssemambo Isa Lukoda It is located in Ssenyange village,in Masaka city.it is regestered with the ministry of Education and Sports as a partnership school
